NewsArticle.Title: Bonus Event
NewsArticle.Content: |------------------------------------Bonus Event------------------------------------| All registered accounts will receive DOUBLE Experience and Ability Points gained through monster kills, quest rewards, etc. Registered accounts will also receive DOUBLE the leveling rate of Skills and Spells. Itemshop Leveling Bonus will stack with this event!!! ((This event will begin on December 30th through January 3rd. Register your accounts to take advantage of this special event!)) Happy New Years, Dark Ages Team
